featured.text: Whenever I set foot on the soil of Rwanda, a country in east-central Africa, I feel as if I have entered paradise: green hills, red earth, sparkling rivers and mountain lakes.
The heart of this continent is the Amazon Rainforest, a vast paradise watered by one of the world’s greatest rivers.
Most of the area is covered by woods, where bird species are so _____ that it is a paradise for birdwatchers.

definition.zh_def: 天堂；理想的地方或狀態。
definition.en_def: A state or place of great happiness and beauty; often referred to as heaven.
definition.example: The garden was a paradise filled with colorful flowers and singing birds.
